teachers.name: Romana Kryzanowska
teachers.title: First Generation Elder
teachers.bio: Trained directly by Joseph Pilates, became heir to the Pilates method
teachers.bio_es: Entrenada directamente por Joseph Pilates, se convirtió en heredera del método Pilates

teachers.name: Ron Fletcher
teachers.title: First Generation Elder
teachers.bio: Former Martha Graham dancer who brought Pilates to Hollywood
teachers.bio_es: Ex bailarín de Martha Graham que llevó el Pilates a Hollywood

teachers.name: Lolita San Miguel
teachers.title: First Generation Elder
teachers.bio: One of only two people certified by Joseph Pilates himself
teachers.bio_es: Una de solo dos personas certificadas por el propio Joseph Pilates

teachers.name: Mari Winsor
teachers.title: Contemporary Master
teachers.bio: Created Winsor Pilates, bringing mat Pilates to millions via video
teachers.bio_es: Creadora de Winsor Pilates, llevando Pilates mat a millones a través de video

teachers.name: Moira Merrithew
teachers.title: STOTT PILATES Co-Founder
teachers.bio: Developed contemporary Pilates with modern exercise science principles
teachers.bio_es: Desarrolló Pilates contemporáneo con principios modernos de ciencia del ejercicio

teachers.name: Rael Isacowitz
teachers.title: BASI Pilates Founder
teachers.bio: World-renowned Pilates educator and founder of BASI Pilates
teachers.bio_es: Educador de Pilates de renombre mundial y fundador de BASI Pilates

teachers.name: Elizabeth Larkam
teachers.title: Pilates Innovator
teachers.bio: Pioneer in integrating Pilates with dance and rehabilitation
teachers.bio_es: Pionera en integrar Pilates con danza y rehabilitación

teachers.name: Brooke Siler
teachers.title: Author & Studio Owner

teachers.bio_es: Autora de 'The Pilates Body' y fundadora del estudio re:AB

teachers.name: Alycea Ungaro
teachers.title: Physical Therapist & Author
teachers.bio: Licensed PT who bridges Pilates and rehabilitation
teachers.bio_es: Fisioterapeuta licenciada que une Pilates y rehabilitación

teachers.name: Kathy Corey
teachers.title: Pilates Historian
teachers.bio: Preserving the legacy and history of classical Pilates
teachers.bio_es: Preservando el legado e historia del Pilates clásico

teachers.name: Amy Taylor Alpers
teachers.title: The Pilates Center Co-Founder
teachers.bio: Trained by Romana, co-founded premier training center
teachers.bio_es: Entrenada por Romana, co-fundó centro de formación premier

teachers.name: Deborah Lessen
teachers.title: Green Street Studio Founder
teachers.bio: Studied directly with Carola Trier, preserving original teachings
teachers.bio_es: Estudió directamente con Carola Trier, preservando enseñanzas originales
